            },
            {
              "@type": "WorkflowStep",
              "name": "Is Approved",
              "description": null,
              "arguments": {
                "conditions": [
                  {
                    "option": "yes",
                    "step_iri": "/api/3/workflow_steps/387d7ba3-b1f1-4199-9d26-0e34387da031",
                    "condition": "{{ vars.steps.Approve_Remediation_Action.approved is sameas true }}",
                    "step_name": "Block Source IP"
                  },
                  {
                    "option": "no",
                    "default": true,

                    "step_name": "No Action"

                ]

              "description": null,
              "arguments": {
                "params": [],

              "uuid": "ef225168-cb44-4043-ad35-c6ddf8fc1ae2"
            },
            {
              "@type": "WorkflowStep",
              "name": "Block Source IP",
              "description": null,
              "arguments": {
                "name": "Fortinet FortiGate",
                "when": "{{vars.source_ip is defined}}",
                "config": "008c79ba-e9ce-467d-a900-95f2993d8f43",
                "params": {
                  "vdom": "",
                  "method": "Quarantine Based",
                  "ip_addresses": "{{vars.source_ip}}",
                  "time_to_live": "1 Hour"
                },
                "version": "4.0.0",
                "connector": "fortigate-firewall",
                "operation": "block_ip",
                "operationTitle": "Block IP Address",
                "pickFromTenant": false,
                "step_variables": []
              },
              "status": null,
              "left": "475",

              "uuid": "387d7ba3-b1f1-4199-9d26-0e34387da031"
            },
            {
              "@type": "WorkflowStep",
              "name": "Disable Username",
              "description": null,
              "arguments": {
                "name": "Active Directory",
                "when": "{{vars.username is defined}}",
                "config": "99f5349d-3efe-4051-bffd-ba33e2822b13",
                "params": {
                  "search_attr_name": "SamAccount Name",
                  "search_attr_value": "{{vars.username}}"
                },
                "version": "2.1.1",
                "connector": "activedirectory",
                "operation": "enable_user_account",
                "operationTitle": "Enable User Account",
                "pickFromTenant": false,
                "step_variables": []
              },

            }
